title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-3.7 - Credit for employers with more than one wslpip
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-3.7 - Credit for employers with more than one wslpip

State Regulations

For each insured with more than one WSLPIP, an insurer shall add all credits to which the insured is entitled for a total combined credit amount. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-3.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
